2_1AZjDLkfYwSmjM7ZJUf7HHnrF778augRMa.body: Internet has less criminals due to its censorship, so with an uncensored network, there is no way to stop them. If zeronet isn't intended to become "dark". We should announce a rule about what cannot be posted to maintream zite (zero me, zero talk, ...) and some kinds of "moderator" to implement the rules.
